name: SlimeCurse
description:
Play as Gooey the Slime, who was born with a terrible curse; the shadow version of himself will split off of him and attack! On his 10th birthday though, the curse weakens enough to break it. What good luck! Now you may be wondering, "what breaks this curse?" Well, its broken by killing the one who made it, Zenos (the king of shadows). Survive 5 waves of enemies to get to the King Zenos, but I doubt you'll even win, since I did not have time for music and an ending so );

 maybe ill work on it later...

This is my first game with 100% Configurable controls*! 

*Some keys not included
